Prerequisite: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.Item.tSL6ilfth2TTRNTR]{Fighting Style}

Some classes already gain this feature at level 5, and gain no further benefit from this feat. Barring unusual multiclassing, the only classes that benefit from this feat are @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class.Item.SmG14gsqWBtqmcjt]{Bards}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class.Item.Z68Q5K5fejrVQZAy]{Clerics}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class.Item.653LgVa3sG4ek6b5]{Druids}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class.Item.emEIZZAh0s8Ed62c]{Sorcerers}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class.Item.qM0tUqAZW3V8L4pF]{Wizards}, and some @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class.Item.whbTNYgkqWV8oGt3]{Warlocks}.

You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the &reference[attack] action on your turn. If you are dual-wielding, your off-hand attack brings you to a total of three attacks.
